Cost of Freedom

A Collective Inquiry

The Book : Collective Memory | OPENING: FREEDOM | ARCHITECTONICS OF POWER | AFFORDANCES | Epilogue : Credits

Sample Article

This is a template. The YAML start mentions title, author, section, layout, previous, up, and next pages.

Section in this example is ‘OPENING: FREEDOM’ because of the special handling of the colon. Other sections do not have this issue.

The previous, up, and next links must be HTML because we can’t do markdown there, unfortunately.

Above the title is the navigation bar. All links are ready, you just need to put bold around the correct section. Section pages are special: they don’t have the link to themselves.

The signature is also HTML because we want to put the CSS class.

This is an 'author bio' paragraph. The Jane Doe can be linked to ../authors/first-lastname using HTML.

  • Keeping Promises
  • OPENING: FREEDOM
  • "Freedom To" vs. "Freedom From"
